body.p:
State of Kentucky
Graves Circuit Court Sct
June Term 1859

The Court also ordered Peter Farthing to execute a Recognizance to keep the peace thereupon said Peter Farthing and A R Bern here in court acknowledged themselves Jointly indebted to the Commonwealth of Kentucky in the penal sum of two hundred and fifty dollars but to be void if the said Peter Farthing shall appear in the Graves Circuit Court on the first day of the next December Term and shall in the mean time keep the peace toward the good citizens of this state and especially toward Alfred Going and shall not depart without leave of the court

Attest Ennis Anderson c g c c
By L F Andrson D C

Peter Farthing
To } Bond
Comlth of Ky
